pli-tv-pvr18:11.1: Upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocentassa saṃghādiseso katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti?
pli-tv-pvr18:11.2: Upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocentassa saṃghādiseso ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti—

pli-tv-pvr18:12.3: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato.
pli-tv-pvr18:13.1: Mātugāmaṃ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsentassa saṃghādiseso katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti?
pli-tv-pvr18:13.2: Mātugāmaṃ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsentassa saṃghādiseso tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti—

pli-tv-pvr18:14.1: Mātugāmassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantassa saṃghādiseso katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti?
pli-tv-pvr18:14.2: Mātugāmassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantassa saṃghādiseso tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti …
pli-tv-pvr18:15.1: Sañcarittaṃ samāpajjantassa saṃghādiseso katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti?
pli-tv-pvr18:15.2: Sañcarittaṃ samāpajjantassa saṃghādiseso chahi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti—
pli-tv-pvr18:15.3: siyā kāyato samuṭṭhāti, na vācato na cittato;

pli-tv-pvr18:15.8: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti.

pli-tv-pvr18:18.1: Bhikkhuṃ amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsentassa saṃghādiseso katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti?
